 Limited Resources - 有限资源

|||    [ Map Info - 地图简介 ]
原文：After months of careful planning and testing the first official version of Limited Resources is open to the public! The goal here is simple – collect the 18 required items for the monument to win the game. There’s only one problem – you’re trapped! Players will find themselves stuck inside a small bedrock prison with no escape.


During your journey in Limited Resources you will uncover many seemingly deserted structures, houses and bunkers. Some of these locations might have exactly what you need for the monument, some may drop you into a hole full of creepers… The more you find and discover, the closer you will be to uncovering the secrets behind the world.


With automatic command block systems, the map will automatically update the monument once you find an item, removing the hassle of you having to place it there yourself. All redstone circuitry for this was designed by the map creators.


Please use MC 1.11


We really hope you enjoy our map!
译文：经过数月的精心策划和测试，有限资源地图的第一个正式版本向大家开放下载！ 这个地图的目标很简单 - 收集遗迹所需的18件物品胜利。 只有一个问题 - 你被囚禁了！ 你将发现自己被囚禁在一个小型基岩监狱内，无法逃脱。


在您游玩有限资源地图的过程中，您将发现许多看似荒芜的建筑，房屋和沙坑。 其中一些地点可能正好符合解锁遗迹的需要，有些可能会让你陷入一个充满苦力怕的洞......你发现的越多，你就越能发现这世界背后的秘密。


此地图使用命令方块系统，地图将在您找到物品后自动更新遗迹，消除您必须自己放置的烦恼。 所有的红石电路都是由作者设计的。


请使用我的世界1.11版本


希望你喜欢我们的地图！

Schematics存档：

1、下载完成后解压，
2、关闭Minecraft，
3、打开MCEdit.exe，点击下方import按钮，选择你下载的文件，
     最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。
